car_type_no = #{carTypeNo} ,
car_type_name = #{carTypeName} ,
transfer_price = #{transferPrice} ,
suitcases_num = #{suitcasesNum} ,
carryon_num = #{carryonNum} ,
update_date=current_timestamp(),

mapper.select: SELECT car_name carName, tc.car_type_no carTypeNo, tc.pic_no picNo, file_url fileUrl, car_type_name carTypeName, (select car_service_price from t_carkind_service tcs where car_service_no='1104' and tcs.car_type_no = tc.car_type_no) halfDayPrice, (select car_service_price from t_carkind_service tcs where car_service_no='1101' and tcs.car_type_no = tc.car_type_no) fullDayPrice, (select car_service_price from t_carkind_service tcs where car_service_no='1102' and tcs.car_type_no = tc.car_type_no) mtyPrice, (select car_service_price from t_carkind_service tcs where car_service_no='1103' and tcs.car_type_no = tc.car_type_no) jslPrice, transfer_price transferPrice, suitcases_num suitcasesNum, carryon_num carryonNum FROM t_car tc LEFT JOIN t_carkind tck ON tc.car_type_no = tck.car_type_no LEFT JOIN t_pic tp ON tc.pic_no = tp.pic_no
